Author: TwoGimpyFeet69

Comment: Hmmm.... as a Special Government Employee, Musk only has 130 days on the clock per calendar year.  So, he only has until the end of May.  Nothing legal stopping him from 'advising' as an outsider, though.    Yes, there is chatter that DOGE will shut down when Musk steps down.  However, the original termination date is / was July 4th. 2026.   Any unfinished DOGE project is likely to be fulfilled by another Agency, or contracted out.  Some unfinished projects might be outright terminated.   Ironically, Mark Cuban has expressed interests in filling in the gaps and re-establishing the U.S. Digital Service of sorts.
Author: crucial_geek

Comment: DOGE was mandated as a temporary entity, running through to July 4th, 2026.  It is ironic that they don't rebrand it or revert back to the U.S. Digital Service.  Oh wait, they gutted that one, too.
